DHS Madurai Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 17 Therapy Assistant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 29, 2025, 17:32 IST
 National Health Mission
 17 Jobs |  Posted On : 29-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 7,500 to 40,000




FOLLOW

The District Health Society Madurai (DHS Madurai) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 17 Medical Consultant, Therapy Assistant, Pharmacist, Multipurpose Worker, Tuberculosis Laboratory Supervisor Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, BUMS, 12th, D. Pharm, Diploma, B.Sc Nursing, DMLT can apply for the DHS Madurai Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Tamil Nadu.

DHS Madurai Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Medical Consultant	03	Any Degree, BUMS
Therapy Assistant	05	B.Sc Nursing
Pharmacist	01	D. Pharm
Multipurpose worker	05	12th, Diploma
Tuberculosis Supervisor	03	ANM, 12th

DHS Madurai Recruitment 2025 Age limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 59 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

DHS Madurai Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Interview.

DHS Madurai Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

DHS Madurai Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 7,500/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 40,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the DHS Madurai Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the DHS Madurai Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee(if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

District Health Officer, District Health Society, District Health Office, Viswanathapuram, Madurai-625014.

Important Dates:

Starting date	29-08-2025
Closing date	10-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Application Form	Click Here
